docs.snippet: It is bewildering to watch Venezuela’s embattled president as he livestreams ever more hours of his life.

docs.snippet: A Romanian politician who escaped a potential manslaughter investigation due to his parliamentary immunity said on Friday he would resign from the senate to allow the probe to go ahead.

docs.snippet: Tim Wu’s “The Attention Merchants” is about the insidiousness of an online business model that captures people’s time and resells it to advertisers.

docs.snippet: A Florida man who espoused anti-Islamic views on social media was charged with setting a fire that damaged a mosque in Fort Pierce, Fla., the authorities said.
